Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires vine trimming for the maintenance of utility poles
Summary: Requires vine trimming, in addition to other maintenance procedures, for the maintenance of utility poles by the utility company or cable television company that owns such utility pole.
LawCode: Add ยง119-d, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to requiring vine trimming for the maintenance of utility poles
